array.string: hide yourself
give it to others
delay and push off until the deadline
make reasonable choice and finish important things first

dict.string: How to deal with limited time?

array.string: call 911
run away as soon as possible
listen and try to help them in public place
ask for money then help

dict.string: a stranger asks you for help:

array.string: In front of her
On the outside of her
Behind her
It doesn’t matter

dict.string: When eating dinner at a restaurant you should:

array.string: Chew loudly and with your mouth open
Eat with your elbows on the table
Comb your hair at the table
Wipe your mouth with the corners of your napkin

dict.string: When at a theater (play, movie, etc…) you should:

array.string: Turn your phone on silent and be respectful of others in the theater during the performance
Answer your phone during the performance
Keep your phone on ring
Talk to your friends during the show
